plurals.name: alert_dialog_exit_ecm
plurals.item: The mobile phone will remain in the emergency callback mode for %s minutes. No app that requires connecting to the data network is available in this mode. Exit now?
The mobile phone will remain in the emergency callback mode for %s minute. No app that requires connecting to the data network is available in this mode. Exit now?

plurals.name: alert_dialog_not_avaialble_in_ecm
plurals.item: The selected action is not available in the emergency callback mode. The mobile phone will remain in this mode for %s minutes. Exit now?
The selected action is not available in the emergency callback mode. The mobile phone will remain in this mode for %s minute. Exit now?
